channel.title: Beat the Clock is coming back in a new form
channel.description:
We're going to try a new concept for running challenges that will allow us to do them more often and add a bit of variation and fun. The idea is to let someone from the community host each challenge. That means coming up with the actual challenge, going through all the submissions, and putting together a shortlist with the submissions that stand out. We will still post the challenge, as well as the shortlist, in the app feed though.
Please note that the reason we want to do these challenges is because we think it's a fun way to spark and highlight creativity in the community. Music quality is obviously subjective and so it's up to each week's host to find the most creative submissions. It's not about winning in an absolute sense, so remind yourself to not think of it that way. Focus on having fun and developing your skills.
The first challenge will be kicked off this Friday, so get your shoes on and get ready to groove!

item.title: Beat the Clock is coming back in a new form
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
The person hosting will of course not be able to put himself/herself on the shortlist, and he/she has to listen to all entries.

We’ll try this out and see how it goes. It’s not the end of the world if we need to adjust down the line. As I’ve said, think of it as something fun instead of trying to see the negatives.

Read full topic

item.title: Beat the Clock is coming back in a new form
item.dc:creator: Zoruwhite
item.description:
It depends, there are actually a few people here who make and listen to many diverse genres of edm, trap, hip hop etc.
So, I’m pretty sure the first community member hosted BTC challenge would be by one of the more talented Auxy users, eventually allowing others as well, I.e: those who ‘won’ the previous challenge, will host the next one
There should be some conditions for hosting though:

  • host is not allowed to participate (reducing chance of bias)
  • host must consider putting aside time to listen to as many entries the challenge receives
  • Team Auxy, have to have featured one or more tracks of the respective host, in app’s feed etc.

Read full topic
